sentences.english: And even businesses with seamless, well-thought-out emergency plans can be ill prepared for the "real thing."
sentences.chinese: 甚至连天衣无缝的周密应急计划都无法应付现实。

sentences.english: The article is close-knit and its argument flawless.
sentences.chinese: 这文章天衣无缝，论证严密。

sentences.english: Likewise, a new team of editors pieces everything together seamlessly.
sentences.chinese: 然后由一组剪辑师天衣无缝地将这些片段拼接起来。

sentences.english: DJs use cross fader to a seamless transfer of sounds.
sentences.chinese: 用平滑转换机来达成天衣无缝的声音转换效果。

definition: perfect and without blemish/flawless/to leave nothing to be desired
lit. not one drop of water can leak out/watertight/rigorous (argument)
to fit tightly (idiom)/to join seamlessly/to fit snugly
(of an argument, theory etc) full of flaws (idiom)
to reach perfection (idiom); a superb artistic achievement
very close/no gap between them/continuously/unbroken/hard to separate/indistinguishable
to cross the sea by a trick (idiom)/to achieve one's aim by underhanded means
closely linked with one another/interlocked/to interrelate
lit. the stove fire has turned bright green (allusion to Daoist alchemy) (idiom)/fig. (of an art, a technique etc) brought to the point of perfection
accurate to perfection (idiom)/precise to the finest detail
